description:
Any legal situation, from divorce to planning a will to an employment claim, presents serious concerns about the future. From the Garden City, Kansas, office of Kennedy Berkley Yarnevich & Williamson, our team brings people peace of mind as they move forward through civil or criminal proceedings. The attorneys at our law firm have decades of combined experience in business, personal injury, Social Security Disability and more.

Thanks to our far-reaching practice areas, our law firm is able to serve clients in just about any capacity. As such, we believe in building solid, lasting relationships with the people we serve, which involves the following:

  • Effectively communicating with clients
  • Listening to clients' concerns and acting on them
  • Making accommodations such as accepting credit cards

This approach is the reason our clients continue to come to us for their legal needs. We exceed expectations because we do more than focus on short-term solutions; we set people up for a brighter future. Our attorneys are proficient in any legal setting, as we have appeared before administrative panels, in state and federal trials and even in appellate courts on a client's behalf. As a full-service law firm, we truly help people from start to finish.

Kennedy Berkley Yarnevich & Williamson has four offices, with our other locations being in Hays, Salina and Overland Park. We take cases throughout Ellis, Saline, Johnson and Finney counties.
